portfolio.title: 🏆Finance For All 🏆
portfolio.description: 🥇Spring 2024 NSBE-SHPE Hackathon Winner🥇||Developed a platform using React and Express JS with Google Gemini integration that simplifies bank comparisons for accounts, credit cards, and loan rates, saving users significant research time.

portfolio.title: CartX
portfolio.technologies: React / Express JS / Python / Selenium / Mongo DB
portfolio.description: ⚡Project Lead⚡||Created a platform using React, Express JS, and Python with Selenium that optimizes shopping by providing real-time price comparisons, reducing user shopping time by up to 15%.

portfolio.title: 🏆EcoVISION🏆
portfolio.description: 🥇Hack RPI Best AI Hack Winner🥇||Created a web app using React and Flask to identify recyclables with 95% accuracy, leveraging AI and OpenCV for image/video analysis. Enhanced waste sorting efficiency by 20% and provided actionable sustainability insights.

portfolio.title: Connect 4 AI
portfolio.description: 🧠2023 Minds and Machines AI Competition Co-Champion🧠||Developed a Connect 4 AI using minimax algorithms and alpha-beta pruning to accurately predict optimal moves up to six moves ahead.

portfolio.title: AlexNet NeuralNet
portfolio.description: 🤖AI Image Recognition Neural Network🤖||Developed an image recognition neural network using AlexNet, a pre-trained 8-layer deep neural network that classifies images into 1,000 categories.

portfolio.title: Math Whisperer
portfolio.technologies: React / OpenAI / Wolfram Alpha / Voice Recognition
portfolio.description: 💡Hack RPI 2023 Submission💡||This project enables visually impaired users to solve math equations using voice commands. It integrates speech recognition and natural language processing to provide auditory feedback for better accessibility.
